mapper.select: select notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title AS noticeTitle, CASE WHEN LENGTH(notice_content) > 12 THEN SUBSTR(notice_content, 1, 12) || '...' ELSE notice_content END AS noticeContent, notice_category AS noticeCategory, TO_CHAR(notice_create, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS noticeCreate from notice ORDER BY notice_id DESC
